message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand that $110 is a good offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant to let it go. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $125. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $115. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand that $115 is a good offer, but I'm still not willing to give up too much. I'm willing to go up to $130, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to go up to $120. Can you meet me at that price?

I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm willing to make one more offer. I'll meet you at $125, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
